Then comes Rinka's mom who is actually a cheating milf, witnessed Charao fucking some other woman by chance. What are the odds that the same guy is actually fucking her daughter? Rinka's mom decides to tell Charao to back off lest he wants to have a little "chat" with the police. Charao notices her husband is a different dude and makes a comeback, then offers to spare Rinka under the condition that she takes Rinka's place. She agrees and justifies her actions as a way to protect her daughter and Takashi. Yawn.

Of course this being a no-brainer NTR manga she decides to get fucked, orgasm'd, decides to fuck with him a little more in all sorts of places officially turning into the slut she imagined herself to be. But waiiiiit! Cue reveal of meganekko who isn't blackmailed but is actually a nympho with a sex drive of OVER 9000!!!, just there to help Charao smash that Rinka puss. Takashi confronts Charao but is mocked that he never knew the true slutty side of Rinka, asks him to hide in the exact same closet he first witnessed them fucking to make a point. From there Rinka loudly confesses that she's addicted to Charaodick only to find out she was being watched by Takashi. From that point on she doesn't bother hiding her perverse allowing Charao to fuck her again and again. Takashi being the NTR fodder still decides that he still loves Rinka regardless, finally getting to pound dat Rinkass he longed for. Need I say more for the ending?

Oh come on this is the generic "Charao fucks girl, girl gets addicted to the orgasms she experienced from the charaodick and goes back to fuck him again" flat, boring NTR plot. What's more to explore about this? What? Still wanna know? Fine, fuckboy, here comes WoT.
Gist of story: Protagonist Takashi, who likes his next door childhood friend Rinka, keeps getting visions about her getting fucked by some other dude. Cue Charao who openly confesses he wants to tap dat Rinka ass and immediately gets his ass kicked. One day Takashi went to her house to bring her class notes, alarmed by her coming back home, hides in her closet and witnesses Charao fucking his beloved Rinka. 
*Flashback to a few months ago* Rinka finds out her meganekko friend was blackmailed to gangbang over a sex video, then decides to confront the culprit only to be stopped by Charao, says he can help meganekko be free under the condition of him banging Rinka once.
I don't mind if I die, but come on now, where's the English version of this whole story, and not the chapters version as it doesn't give the whole story.
